title: 2018 video falsely shared as ‘Alia Bhatt arriving at the hospital after Rishi Kapoor’s death’.
subtitle: Video shared as Alia Bhatt arriving at the hospital after Rishi Kapoor’s death was actually taken in 2018 at the Krishna Raj Kapoor’s funeral.
author: factly.in
vclaim:
A video is being shared widely on social media with a claim that it shows Alia Bhatt arriving at the hospital to support Ranbir Kapoor after his father Rishi Kapoor’s death. Let’s fact-check the claim made in the post. 



Claim: Video of Alia Bhatt arriving at the hospital after Rishi Kapoor’s death. Fact: Video shared as Alia Bhatt arriving at the hospital after Rishi Kapoor’s death is an old one. The video was taken in 2018 at Raj Kapoor’s funeral. Hence the claim made in the post is FALSE.

When the screenshots of the video were run through Google Reverse Image search, a similar video was found in the search results. This video on YouTube has some visuals shown in the initial part of the posted video. The video was uploaded on YouTube in 2018 with the description that it was taken at Krishna Raj Kapoor’s funeral.

So, when searched with keywords, another video from Krishna Raj Kapoor’s funeral was found which has the same visuals of Alia Bhatt, Karan Johar and Aamir Khan as shown in the posted video.

Other visuals in the posted video can be also found in the newspaper articles related to the Krishna Raj Kapoor’s funeral. Krishna Raj Kapoor died in 2018. So, the visuals are not related to the recent death of Rishi Kapoor’s.

To sum it up, a video taken in 2018 falsely shared as ‘Alia Bhatt arriving at the hospital after Rishi Kapoor’s death’.
